text: Rewee Alla wata on kafidu e Makko hay huunde. Jibimɓe on ɓen moƴƴoɗon e maɓɓe, e joomiraaɓe ɓadondiral'en, e wonduɓe ɓen, e waasuɓe ɓen, e kawtaljo jom-ɓadondiral, e kawtal baŋŋe, e wonndiɗɗo baŋŋe, e ɓii laawol, e ɓen ɓe jeyruɗon ñaame mon. Pellet, Alla Yiɗaa kala on laatiiɗo ñaaƴoowo mantotooɗo
